metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In the morning, stir again and add your favorite toppings. Egg Muffins Ingredients: • 6 large eggs • 1/4 cup milk • 1/2 cup diced bell pepper • 1/2 cup diced spinach • 1/4 cup shredded cheese • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Stir in bell pepper, spinach, and cheese. • Pour the mixture into a greased muffin tin. • Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the eggs are set.

o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm. Banchan • Ingredients: o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi • Instructions: o Prepare each side dish separately. o Arrange on small plates. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

• 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon • 1 tablespoon butter Instructions: • In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon. • Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides. • Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. • Cook the bread slices until golden brown on both sides. • Serve with syrup and powdered sugar.

Msemen • Ingredients: o 2 cups flour o 1 cup semolina o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 cup water o 1/4 cup butter • Instructions: o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl. o Add water and knead until smooth. o Divide dough into balls and roll out into thin circles. o Brush with melted butter and fold into squares. o Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides. o Serve warm.
